tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PropertyListings (
    listing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_address VARCHAR(255),
    property_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    property_type VARCHAR(50),
    property_size INT,
    property_bedrooms INT,
    property_bathrooms INT,
    alert_criteria VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE PropertyListings (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255),
    property_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Criteria (
    criteria_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    criteria_name VARCHAR(50),
    property_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    max_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE property_listings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255),
    property_type VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    bedrooms INT,
    bathrooms INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_criteria (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    min_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    max_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    min_bedrooms INT,
    max_bedrooms INT
);

CREATE TABLE email_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    property_id INT,
    email_sent_date TIMESTAMP,
    email_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE property_listings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    bedrooms INT,
    bathrooms INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    min_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    max_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    min_bedrooms INT,
    max_bedrooms INT,
    min_bathrooms INT,
    max_bathrooms INT
);

CREATE TABLE property_alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    property_id INT,
    criteria VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_preferences(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES property_listings(id)
);

CREATE TABLE email_queue (
    email_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recipient_email VARCHAR(255),
    subject VARCHAR(255),
    message TEXT,
    sent BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE
);

CREATE TABLE log_emails (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (email_id) REFERENCES email_queue(email_id)
);
